title: Virtual Web-Application environnement
description:
A virtual Web-Application environnement allowing the access to webapps via a webinterface with a virtual desktop, user system, file system, etc. Similar to Microsoft Office for example.

Frontend Written in pure HTML, CSS, JS.
Backend Written in JavaScript for the API, Python for the websocket.
Database: postgres
Deployement: Docker

title: Personal website
description: A personal static website written in pure HTML, CSS and JavaScript with no third party library or framework.
